attributes.title: Tough Times on Mango Street
attributes.caption: Geoff’s love of western folk music takes a bizarre turn, and leaves him to ponder just what makes a place like Mango Street so dangerous.
attributes.description: Geoff’s love of western folk music takes a bizarre turn, and leaves him to ponder just what makes a place like Mango Street so dangerous.

attributes.title: I Know Who Shot JR
attributes.caption: This week Geoff goes down a rabbit hole on the night time soap opera "Dallas", the history of the cliffhanger, who shot Mr Burns, and who shot JR. It might have taken 8 months to resolve the storyline but you can learn all about it on this week's So... Alright.
attributes.description: This week Geoff goes down a rabbit hole on the night time soap opera "Dallas", the history of the cliffhanger, who shot Mr Burns, and who shot JR. It might have taken 8 months to resolve the storyline but you can learn all about it on this week's So... Alright.

attributes.title: I Saw Dead People
attributes.caption: The discovery of a dead body sends Geoff on an uncomfortable trip down memory lane.
attributes.description: The discovery of a dead body sends Geoff on an uncomfortable trip down memory lane.

attributes.title: This One Goes to 11
attributes.caption: A string of unfortunate fictional deaths leads Geoff down a rabbit hole of real ones. But hey, the music's good.
attributes.description: A string of unfortunate fictional deaths leads Geoff down a rabbit hole of real ones. But hey, the music's good.

attributes.title: Second Time's a Charm?
attributes.caption: Geoff records the same podcast about Acapulco twice, because he is an idiot. Enjoy!
attributes.description: Geoff records the same podcast about Acapulco twice, because he is an idiot. Enjoy!

attributes.title: A Long Walk
attributes.caption: Geoff interviews a new friend about his cross country adventure.
attributes.description: Geoff interviews a new friend about his cross country adventure.

attributes.title: Geoff Works Through Some Shit

attributes.description:

attributes.caption: Geoff does some armchair psychoanalysis on James Cameron.

attributes.title: Histories Highest Five
attributes.caption: Geoff learns the real story about the first high five, and how it went on to stand for so much more than baseball.

attributes.title: Are we Getting Dumber?
attributes.caption: This week Geoff uses an experience at the theme park to discuss the question ""are we getting dumber?"" The answer might confuse you.
